net.glowstone.net.pipeline

Class MessageHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.channel.SimpleChannelInboundHandler<com.flowpowered.network.Message>
          • net.glowstone.net.pipeline.MessageHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler

    public final class MessageHandler
extends io.netty.channel.SimpleChannelInboundHandler<com.flowpowered.network.Message>
    Experimental pipeline component, based on flow-net's MessageHandler.
